entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Blowing snow. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
